lines.text: Hello, Joe.

[on an eagle's nest with a single egg]
He'll never find me up here. I'll bet a million bucks he won't.

[Droopy hatches out of egg, holding a large wad of cash in in one]
You're covered, Joe.
Boo!
Well I'll be. He finally got me. But there's one little thing that's been bothering me. I wonder if there was more than one of them little guys?
[he then looks out of his cell to see numerous Droopy Dogs, dressed in Mounted Police uniforms]
What do you think, brother?

[on a small island, points at a rock to his right]
Yeah, I know. He'll probably be right under that rock.

[Droopy comes out from under a rock to the wolf's left]
Nope. Under this one.
[the Wolf is being pursued by Droopy everywhere he goes; he winds up at the zoo, out of breath]
That's the last straw. I give up.
[points to a lion in a cage]
I'm going to throw myself to the lions!
[he opens into the lion's mouth, only to find inside... ]
Crowded, isn't it?
[the Wolf lets out a horse-like whinny and jumps out of the lion's mouth]
[after Killer Joe is hit in his face, by a snowball]
Who threw that?
I did.
[Killer Joe Wolf's body falls apart into approximately 12 pieces, temporarily]
[after Killer Joe Wolf sneaks into an MGM theatre, he starts to watch the screen, after the MGM lion roars]
Hello, Joe!
[after Joe sees & hears Droopy, his eyes are immediately extra large, in deep shock, his eyes appear to be pulled out, almost]
